revised_title: The Structure, Relations, and Development of the Electric Organ in the Skate
tldr: The author examines the structure, relations, and progressive growth of the electric organ in the skate. They contrast the organ of Raia batis with that of Torpedo and refer to the various modifications of the electric organ found in the Skate genus. The study reveals the electric organ's relation to the muscular system and its development from specific caudal muscles.
